decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | Any machinery audible outside the premises must be designed to an acoustic standard not exceeding Noise Rating NR35 measured or calculated at the nearest horizontal or vertical boundary of the nearest affected dwelling, whichever is the closer.   REASON:  To protect the living conditions of neighbouring occupiers. | The restaurant/coffee shop use permitted shall be used only for purposes incidental to the authorised retail (A1) use of the premises and shall be implemented in accordance with the appropriate plans.  REASON:  A separate A3 use would be inappropriate in this location.
description: Internal and external refurbishment of existing retail warehouse
